Judul: AUTOMATIC FLIGHT CONTROL SYSTEM DESIGN AND HARDWARE IN THE LOOP SIMULATION ON LONGITUDINAL MODE OF PT. UAVINDO NUSANTARA CR-10 UAV
Abstrak:
Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) is now becoming important concern to an archipelagic country such as Indonesia. UAVindo Nusantara CR-10 UAV was to be applied by an automatic flight control system. The UAV uses a twin panel vertical tail with double tail boom configuration. The control system uses Linear Time Invariant (LTI) Control System in longitudinal section those are Altitude Hold and Speed Hold systems. Before the implementation, the system was applied in Hardware In the Loop (HIL) simulation to ensure the performance of the control system.
